row.entry: Top left pile. The rest of the deck is placed here after dealing the Tableau. Cards are turned over one at a time to Waste. No redeals.
A serem retiradas do monte. Carta no topo disponível para jogar.
Four piles on top row. To be built up in suit from Ace to King.
Ten piles of three cards each, with the last row of cards face up.

sect2.title: Objetivo
sect2.para: Move all cards to Foundation piles.

sect2.title: Regras
sect2.para: Cards in Tableau are built down by alternate color. The top card or the complete face up portion of each pile is available for play. Empty piles can be filled with any available card or group of cards.
Foundation piles are to be built up in suit from Ace to King. Cards in Foundation are no longer in play.
Cards are flipped singly from Stock to Waste. Top card of Waste pile is always available for play. There are no redeals.

sect2.title: Pontuação
sect2.para: Each card moved to Foundation scores one point.

sect2.title: Estratégia
sect2.para: Caution is for those who actually have money at stake. Live dangerously. Make any moves you can, as chance is on your side.
